text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/readme"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/dict":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/dict","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","text":"smile: ğŸ˜ƒ question: â“ info: â„¹ï¸ checkbox: âœ… error: âœ˜ msg: ğŸ’¬ rocket: ğŸš€ book: ğŸ“– shower: ğŸš¿ fly: ğŸš traffic: ğŸš¦ hourglass: âŒ› tada: ğŸ‰ kbd: âŒ¨ danger: â˜  warn: âš  "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/example":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/example","text":"<<.preamble """<> this is a new, just resolve copy emoji(WIP) trouble""">> !! example <> error <> question ; rocket <> default is rocket ; shower <> default is rocket ; traffic <> default is rocket ; tada <> this is a tada emoji <> bingo ; list <> still can use bullets for symbol macro <> status <> bingo <> menu Inspired by latex emoji package [[latex-emoji|https://github.com/stone-zeng/latex-emoji]] and [[neotw/bullets]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/macro":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/macro","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define emoji(symbol:rocket) \whitespace trim \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\define emojid(text) .neotw-$text$:before { content: "{{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-emoji/dict##$text$}} "; } \end <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> "}}}
